author: cmlenz
msg: Provide a way for the user to specify custom files to be included in the ./conf directory of Tomcat.
This is realized by allowing nested <conf> filesets.

author: cmlenz
msg: Don't shut down a container that has not been started by us.
Fixes the previously added test case.

author: cmlenz
msg: Add a test that verifies that a container which is already running is left alone.
